spec_data.Name: plantuml
spec_data.Description:
PlantUML is a program allowing to draw UML diagrams, using a simple
and human readable text description. It is extremely useful for code
documenting, sketching project architecture during team conversations
and so on.

PlantUML supports the following diagram types
  - sequence diagram
  - use case diagram
  - class diagram
  - activity diagram
  - component diagram
  - state diagram
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:52:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Program to generate UML diagram from a text description
